text: We celebrate the new year with a new version! üéâ v1.8 comes with bug fixes, doc updates and a new [_segment_ style for bed tracks](http://higlass.io/l/?d=MBiWiOT1SKC4maLcodthew).
üì¢ We just released v1.7. It comes support for [view scrolling](https://flekschas.github.io/higlass-fancy/scrollable.html) as well as several minor improvements and bug fixes.

Version 1.6 is out! ü•≥ Please welcome [diagonal split matrices](http://higlass.io/l/?d=cX4bUPtPSIqPtsQ7r6pBGg) and the [in-app viewconf editor](https://twitter.com/flekschas/status/1153306437117972485).
üêç We‚Äôre happy to announce the first beta version of the [higlass-python](https://github.com/higlass/higlass-python) for using HiGlass in Jupyter notebooks.
Here is [our presentation](https://youtu.be/v62k4Ok1S8g) from the fantastic SciPy conference.
Version 1.5 is here with [new features](https://flekschas.github.io/higlass-v1.5-example/) for developers.
Version 1.4 is online and brings [new features](http://higlass.io/app/?config=cjmbb_MSQ56_Pi9zX9_n3Q) and [bug fixes](https://github.com/higlass/higlass/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#v140).
üéä Our biggest update yet: version 1.3! Stay tuned for a blog post on what's new. Meanwhile check the [changelog](https://github.com/higlass/higlass/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#v130).
Version 1.2 is out. Take a look at the [changelog](https://github.com/higlass/higlass/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#v120) for a list of changes.
üéâ The HiGlass paper is new out in [Genome Biology](https://genomebiology.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s13059-018-1486-1)
